rule_form_rule_continue_tooltip:
When the conditions of this rule are met, it is applied.
If this option is selected, the following rules will also be assessed.
Otherwise, the assessment stops here.
description: Set up how your messages will be sent by choosing categories and priorities for each contact.
add_routing_error_message: An error has occurred creating the rule.
add_routing_info: By default, messages are sent to the primary contact listed in your Control Panel. Here you can create exceptions.
edit_routing_error_message: An error has occurred modifying the rule.
delete_routing_error_message: An error has occurred deleting the rule.
delete_routing_modal_info: Are you sure you want to delete the {{ routingName }} rule?
rule_form_active_label_tooltip: Select this option to apply the delivery rule. If you disable it, the rule will not be applied. You can enable it later
rule_form_rules_error_message: You need to add at least one condition
